Class KontaktProximityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.manager.KontaktProximityManager

    com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.manager.ProximityManagerContract

    public class KontaktProximityManager
extends Object
implements com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.manager.ProximityManagerContract
    Provides Scan management for normal Beacons and shuffled beacons.
